casebody.data:
James Fitzpatrick, as Administrator, &c., Appellant, v. The New York, New Haven & Hartford R. R. Co., Respondent. Decided March 14, 1887. Appeal from judgment in favor of defendant, entered on verdict rendered under direction of the court. Julius Lipman, for appellant, John E. Parsons, of counsel, and H. H. Anderson, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Opinion by Truax, J.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
